creators.name: Bruno C. Vellutini
creators.affiliation: Max Planck Institute of Molecular Cell Biology and Genetics

title: Lookup tables (LUTs) for Fiji/ImageJ unambiguous to color blind humans.
description: Masataka Okabe and Kei Ito first proposed this color set in their meticulous work describing how to make color blind friendly figures [1]. Using the LUT Panel plugin developed by Patrick Pirrotte and Jerome Mutterer [2], I created the corresponding LUT files for Okabe & Itoâ€™s color set to use on confocal stacks in ImageJ.
references: Okabe M, Ito K. **How to make figures and presentations that are friendly to color blind people**. In: Jfly: data repository for *Drosophila* researchers [Internet]. 20 Nov 2002 [cited 6 Apr 2015]. Available: https://jfly.uni-koeln.de/html/color_blind/
Pirrotte P, Mutterer J. **LUT Panel**. In: ImageJ plugins website [Internet]. 15 Mar 2003 [cited 6 Apr 2015]. Available: https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/plugins/lut-panel.html
